item.title: A Fake Evangelion Adult Swim Promo
item.author: nick@nick64.me (Nick64)
item.description: Made this promo while listening to the track in the video, thought of this, and made it this morning. Honestly pretty proud of it, but I don’t know if it really fits in with the style of Adult Swim promos. Maybe a little. I don’t know. Enjoy.

item.title: My New Friend
item.author: nick@nick64.me (Nick64)
item.description: Hey guys, today I was out and about and I found this little guy chilling around in my subconscious, so I put my finger wwaaaaaayyyy inside my nose until I could touch my brain and I picked him right out. Meet my new friend guys! My new friend He’s a little bit shy, so please be nice. He likes playing tic-tac-toe and drinking Dr Pepper!

item.title: Sketch (12-04-2022)
item.author: nick@nick64.me (Nick64)
item.description: Made this sketch today, I think there are obviously some faults because I am in no way an expert at art or anything, but I'm honestly just proud of the progress I'm making. Granted, I did use a reference, but no tracing or anything, so I'm happy. I need to keep doing these so I can properly understand human proportions and draw better.
